metadata.title: CVE-2014-5316 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Dotclear before 2.6.4 allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted page.

criterions.comment: dotclear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
